item.name: config
item.item: ↑ Use this field if you have good cron knowledge.

item.name: config
item.item: Export only new items after latest job execution

item.name: config
item.item: Mapping feature allows you to set the conformity between custom data structure and Magento 2 fields. Entity - source of system attribute; System Attribute - select system attributes that should be mapped to custom attributes; Export Attributes - specify custom attributes; DefaultValued - add hardcoded values if necessary.

item.name: config
item.item: Filters allow you to import / export only specific entities which match configured filter conditions.
